By installing, copying, or otherwise using the SOFTWARE PRODUCT, you agree to be bound by the terms of this EULA. This license agreement represents the entire agreement concerning the program between you and %2$s, (referred to as "licenser"), and it supersedes any prior proposal, representation, or understanding between the parties. If you do not agree to the terms of this EULA, do not install or use the SOFTWARE PRODUCT.
 
 The SOFTWARE PRODUCT is protected by copyright laws and international copyright treaties, as well as other intellectual property laws and treaties. The SOFTWARE PRODUCT is licensed, not sold. 
 
 /// GOVERNING LAW
 This EULA is governed by the Japanese laws. I and User each irrevocably and unconditionally submit to the exclusive jurisdiction and venue of %3$s, and each knowingly waives any objection that the courts therein do not have personal jurisdiction or that the courts are an improper forum, or not a convenient forum.
